import React from 'react'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; const Features = () => { return (

Transparent/Honesty (Know Who You're Working With)

FULLY transparent & honest experience from start to finish. We require ALL hacker's & employers alike to verify their identity with physical documents before any invasive action can be taken! We take every precaution possible to protect BOTH parties in this process, just know you're in good hands..

Completely Open Marketplace - Freely Engage/Interact!

Our platform is set-up to allow user's to freely interact WITHOUT some outragous time/wait-span until your account is active & you can start making money, make money almost IMMEDIATELY! We do have many checks and safeguards however they will not restrict you from most activity, only restricts engagement in certain activities.. We HIGHLY recommend authenticating your account as soon as possible though to better your ranking/level!

Hire TOP hacker's in a competitive/challenging enviorment!

Our system use's a 'ranking/level' system rewarding users for their accomplishments in a 'game-like' fashion while also indicating WHO is very active and WHO IS NOT.

) } export default Features;
